survey_name: Patient Satisfaction with Telehealth Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate patient satisfaction with telehealth services, including ease of use, quality of care, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your recent telehealth appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your recent telehealth appointment?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues did you encounter during your telehealth appointment? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Technical difficulties (e.g., poor connection, audio/video issues)
Lack of personal connection with the provider
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question to identify common pain points. Include an option for 'None of the above' to capture positive experiences.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues did you encounter during your telehealth appointment? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Technical difficulties (e.g., poor connection, audio/video issues)
Lack of personal connection with the provider

questions.question_text: What do you think could be improved about the telehealth service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What do you think could be improved about the telehealth service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood. Ensure the scale is consistent with Q1.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?

questions.question_text: Which device did you use for your telehealth appointment?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which device did you use for your telehealth appointment?
